By Thorr on Tuesday, August 10, 2010 - 01:16 pm:

You should avoid doing that with your monster. There's a reason that the Lab girl shows up on your ranch when your second monster hits its prime. Combining monsters in their prime (before they become mature) is a major boost for combination stats.
